description: Service Spec declares the image specification and the desired state of the service

io.hyscale.api.image.Dockerfile.description: Describes dockerfile settings to create container image.

dockerfilePath.description: defines the path to dockerfile. Effective dockerfile is $path/$dockerfilePath

target.description: specify an intermediate build stage by name as a final stage for the resulting image in case of multi-stage dockerfile. Docker will read the instruction upto that specified stage from dockerfile while building the image.

args.description: args is the list of build arguments to be passed during container image build. should be given in this format <key>=<value>

io.hyscale.api.image.buildSpec.Artifact.description: Describes artifact source and destination inside container.

name.description: defines the name of the artifact. should be unique

source.description: defines the source path of the artifact. should be relative path if provider is local. full remote url if http is given, file path to the artifact in the remote ssh

destination.description: defines the destination path inside container.

io.hyscale.api.image.BuildSpec.description: Describes buildSpec settings to create container image.

configCommandsScript.description: defines a script containing configuration commands. script execution happens at the time of image build

configCommands.description: defines configuration commands. execution happens at the time of image build

runCommandsScript.description: defines a script containing run commands. Gets executed at the time of container start

runCommands.description: defines run commands. Gets executed at the time of container start

io.hyscale.api.image.Image.description: Describes container Image, could be from dockerfile or buildSpec

tag.description: tag defines the final image tag

registry.description: docker registry url along with namespace

dockerfile.description: dockerfile describes how to build container image using dockerfile.

buildSpec.description: buildSpec describes what the image should contain like stack, artifact and configuration. It is considered as an alternative to dockerfile spec

io.hyscale.api.props.PropsVolumePath.description: Defines the absolute path to where the props have to be mounted in the container

io.hyscale.api.secrets.SecretsVolumePath.description: Defines the absolute path to where the secrets have to be mounted in the container

io.hyscale.api.map.string.description: Describes the key-value pair of any attribute

io.hyscale.api.list.string.description: Defines the keys of any attribute the service

io.hyscale.api.replicas.Replicas.description: Defines the replicas of the service

min.description: specifies the min no.of replicas required for this service

max.description: specifies the max no.of replicas required for this service

cpuThreshold.description: specifies the cpu threshold in percentage for the replicas to scale

name.description: name of service spec, also used as endpoint

replicas.description: number of replicas of this service

items.description: describes provision and attachment of volume

storageClass.description: defines the class for storage provider of your cluster volumes

props.description: props is an unstructured key value map

propsVolumePath.description: Defines the absolute path to where the props have to be mounted in the container

items.description: defines port along with healthcheck and lbmappings if any

port.description: defines port number along with type. default type is tcp.

secretsVolumePath.description: Defines the absolute path to where the secrets have to be mounted in the container

memory.description: Defines the range of memory the service has to use in the container

cpu.description: Defines the range of cpu the service has to use in the container

startCommand.description: Defines the command which gets executed at the time of container start

agents.description: Describes the list of sidecars to be attached to the service

name.description: Describes the name of the sidecar

props.description: Describes the properties of the service sidecar as key-value pairs

propsVolumePath.description: Describes the properties volume of the service

secrets.description: Describes the secrets of the service as an array

secretsVolumePath.description: Describes the secrets volume of the service.

volumes.description: Describes the shared volumes of the service

attach.description: Defines the volume name of the service that has to be attached to the sidecar.

mountPath.description: Defines the mount path that volume has to be mounted on the sidecar

items.description: defines the agent with its properties

k8sSnippets.description: Define the list of k8sSnippets that needs to patched in the generated manifest files
